pr_title: [#1568] Add restricted API to allow access to internals of the node model

timeline.bodyText: Suggested change * nodes. May return null. * nodes. May return null.
timeline.author: kthoms

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/org.eclipse.xtext/src/org/eclipse/xtext/nodemodel/impl/InternalNodeModelUtils.java b/org.eclipse.xtext/src/org/eclipse/xtext/nodemodel/impl/InternalNodeModelUtils.java
index 6107603fb..59e9b1804 100644
--- a/org.eclipse.xtext/src/org/eclipse/xtext/nodemodel/impl/InternalNodeModelUtils.java
+++ b/org.eclipse.xtext/src/org/eclipse/xtext/nodemodel/impl/InternalNodeModelUtils.java

@@ -58,7 +58,7 @@ public class InternalNodeModelUtils {
 	
 	/**
 	 * Obtain the parent node of the given node. Does not unfold {@link SyntheticCompositeNode synthetic}
-	 * nodes. May return null.
+	 * nodes. May return {@code null}.
 	 * 
 	 * @since 2.24
 	 */
